Queries.GridAddInAvailable: SELECT "Code" AS "AddIn", "Name" AS "Nombre AddIn", "U_Version" AS "Version AddIn" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOADMINADDON" WHERE "U_Status" = 'I'
Queries.GridAddInActive: SELECT "Code" AS "AddIn", "Name" AS "Nombre AddIn", "U_Version" AS "Version AddIn", CASE WHEN "U_Status" = 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN "U_Status" = 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' WHEN "U_Status" = 'S' THEN 'Sin licencia"' ELSE '' END AS "Estado" FROM "%sNameDB%"."@BOADMINADDON" WHERE "U_Status" IN ('A','S')
